info.title: Developer API
info.description:
The Developer API is designed for partners to originate
and manage loans through their lifecycle.

manufacturer.description:
Name of the manufacturer of the project component.


**Will be included on the `BATTERY`, `INVERTER` and `PANEL` component types.**

quantity.description:
Count of components in the project.


**Will be included on the `BATTERY` component types.**

capacity.description:
Total battery capacity in kilowatt-hours.


**Will be included on the `BATTERY` component type.**

value.description:
For System Size, kW between 0 and 100 with accuracy to the thousandths. For System EAP, kWh must be 1000 or greater.


**Will be included on the `SYSTEM_SIZE` and `SYSTEM_EAP` component types.**

data.description:
A collection of entities returned during a successful request. 
    If there are no results, an empty collection will be returned; otherwise there will be some elements listed.

get.summary: Get the current health of the service.
get.description: Returns success status if the server is online.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/health');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_GET);
try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 200) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}

get.description: Returns a collection of categories.

x-codeSamples.label: NodeJs

x-codeSamples.source:
HttpResponse response = Unirest.get("https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/categories")
  .header("authorization", "Basic " + Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString((YOUR_API_KEY_ID + ":" + YOUR_API_KEY_SECRET).getBytes()))
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .header("cache-control", "no-cache")
  .asString();

schema.description:
Supply a comma-delimited list of state codes to help refine what channels are available. 

These **ARE** case-sensitive. 

States are configured with our support team.

get.description:
Get a collection of valid channels for the client. 
Useful when searching for offers that are available to an applicant given a channel under which the client
wishes to operate.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/channels');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_GET);
$request->setAuth('organizationId', 'apiKey', HTTP_Request2::AUTH_DIGEST);
$url = $request->getUrl();
$url->setQueryVariables(array(
    'states' => 'CA,NV,AZ'
));

try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 201) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}

applicantSignature.description:
Applicant's signature converted to base64 encoding. 


Common `image` formats (`.jpeg`, `.png`, `.gif`, `.svg`) and file sizes `< 10mb` are supported.



Example 1: `data:image/png;base64,i1234lkj123;k4;l1j34l1kj3j..`


Example 2: `data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAQ..`

Value of the Currency(). Two point precision decimal.

isMobileOrManufacturedHome.description: If the home is mobile or manufactured. Required only for home improvement type loans.

referenceNumber.description: User defined reference number (required for some installers). Will default to primary borrower's last name if not supplied

disclosureToken.description: Token of the current disclosure version authenticating that it was shown to the borrower.

enrollments.description: The enrollments that applicant(s) have selected. The absence of these enrollments will default them to unenrolled.

organizationType.description: Type of the organization a partner can add as a party to a loan.

parties.description: A list of connected parties to add to the loan

post.description: Submit an application to create a new loan. Returns the applications outcome

x-codeSamples.source:
HttpResponse response = Unirest.post("https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/loans")
            .header("authorization", "Basic " + Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString((YOUR_API_KEY_ID + ":" + YOUR_API_KEY_SECRET).getBytes()))
            .header("content-type", "application/json")
            .header("cache-control", "no-cache")
.body("{"field1":"xyz","field2":"abc"}")
            .asString();

schema.description:
Filter the collection by channels available to the partner. 
 Example: `channels[]=GOLD`

Filter by two-character state code in which the partner operates. The collection will be empty if the partner does not operate in the provided states. 
 Example: `states[]=CA`
Filter the collection by an installation category. The collection will be empty if the partner does not operate with the supplied category id.
Filter by promotion ids to see what offers are available given those promotions. The collection will return offers that applied the supplied promotion(s)
Fetches the available offers to an existing loan to perform a change order.
Indicates the number of offers returned in the response. Defaults to 100 offers.
Indicates the client would like a result that is `pageSize` results before the cursor supplied.
Indicates the client would like a result that is `pageSize` results after the cursor supplied.

schema.description:
At least one offer Id, as an array of Ids, for payment calculation. 
If an invalid offer id is supplied, it will be filtered out of the 
results.
The format of this must be comma-delimited. See the example!

The loan amount for the calculation in either integer or two-point precision decimal format.

Disclaimer: The payments endpoint does not evaluate loan amount thresholds for loan submission.

The extra paydown amount for payment calculation in either integer or two-point precision decimal format.

Note: Supplied paydown amounts larger than the loan amount are ignored.

Disclaimer: The supplied paydown amount will overwrite the assumed ITC calculation for Solar or Battery Only loans.

The extra paydown percentage for payment calculation in two-point precision decimal format between 0 (0%) and 1 (100%).

This will affect an INITIAL type payment and not the adjusted.

Disclaimer: The supplied paydown percentage will overwrite the assumed ITC calculation for Solar or Battery Only loans.
 
Disclaimer 2: If extraPaymentAmount is supplied, this parameter will be ignored.
The currency used for the calculations.

get.description: Calculate estimated payments for offers.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/payments');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_GET);
$request->setAuth('organizationId', 'apiKey', HTTP_Request2::AUTH_DIGEST);
$url = $request->getUrl();
$url->setQueryVariables(array(
    'offerIds' => '1,2,3',
    'amount' => 10000
));

try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 201) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}

schema.description: Filter by an installation category under which the organization operates.
Specify the number of promotions to include in a page.
Give the results before the cursor supplied, given the page size.
Give the results after the cursor supplied, given the page size.

schema.description:
Supply a comma-delimited list of channels to help refine what states are available. 

These **ARE** case-sensitive. 

Channels are configured with our support team and can have varying names. 
They are typically found on the end of a clients custom application URL. 


Example: `apply.goodleap.com/..url things and stuff/<channel-here>`

get.description:
Get a collection of valid states for the client. 
Useful when searching for offers that are available to an applicant in their state.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/states');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_GET);
$request->setAuth('organizationId', 'apiKey', HTTP_Request2::AUTH_DIGEST);
$url = $request->getUrl();
$url->setQueryVariables(array(
    'channels' => 'bronze,silver,gold'
));

try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 201) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}

get.description: Returns a collection of users belonging to the requesting organization.

x-codeSamples.label: NodeJs

x-codeSamples.source:
HttpResponse response = Unirest.get("https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/users")
  .header("authorization", "Basic " + Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString((YOUR_API_KEY_ID + ":" + YOUR_API_KEY_SECRET).getBytes()))
  .header("content-type", "application/json")
  .header("cache-control", "no-cache")
  .asString();

password.description:
User's password that must contain:
          
- at least one uppercase character
          
- at least one lowercase character
          
- at least one numeric character
          
- at least one special character
          
- at least 8 total characters

}

schema.description: The type of file upload to produce a URL.

Specifies the type of document that will be uploaded. Focused on the upload type `STIP` and `CASE`,
but being optional it will default to `OTHER` if not supplied. When the client is able
to identify the type, it should be supplied.

Required when using the resource to generate a URL for the upload type `STIP` and `CASE` .
Uniquely identifies the stipulation.

Indicates that the upload is a supplemental HIC document.


This will create a filename like `{loan-id}.supplemental.pdf`.

get.description: Get a single-use, signed URL to upload a document.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/uploadurls');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_GET);
$request->setAuth('organizationId', 'apiKey', HTTP_Request2::AUTH_DIGEST);
$url = $request->getUrl();
$url->setQueryVariables(array(
    uploadType: 'HIC',
    supplemental: false
));

try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 201) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}

type.description: Different aspects of the project component.
type.title: type

manufacturer.description:
Name of the manufacturer of the project component.


**Required for the `BATTERY`, `INVERTER` and `PANEL` component types.**
manufacturer.title: manufacturer

quantity.description:
Count of components in the project.


**Required for the `BATTERY` component types.**
quantity.title: quantity

capacity.description:
Total battery capacity in kilowatt-hours.


**Required for the `BATTERY` component type.**
capacity.title: capacity

value.description:
For System Size, kW between 0 and 100 with accuracy to the thousandths. For System EAP, kWh must be 1000 or greater.


**Required for the `SYSTEM_SIZE` and `SYSTEM_EAP` component types.**
value.title: value

components.description: A list of components that make up the project.
components.title: PutProjectRequestInput

put.description: Add or update a loans project information.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/loans/{ loan-id }/project');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_PUT);
$request->setConfig(array(
  'follow_redirects' => TRUE
));
$request->setHeader(array(
  'Authorization' => '{ username & api-key }',
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json'
));
$request->setBody('{\n    "components": [{\n        "type": "BATTERY",\n        "manufacturer": "SomeManufacturer",\n        "quantity": 1,\n        "capacity": 12.03\n    }]\n}');
try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 200) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}

schema.description:
Specifies the type of document that will be uploaded. Focused on the upload type `CASE`,
but being optional it will default to `OTHER` if not supplied. When the client is able
to identify the type, it should be supplied.
Optional reference to a caseId on a loan

get.description: Get a single-use, signed URL to upload a case document.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/loans/{id}/cases/{caseId}/uploadurl');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_GET);
$request->setAuth('organizationId', 'apiKey', HTTP_Request2::AUTH_DIGEST);
$url = $request->getUrl();
$url->setQueryVariables(array(
    mimeType: 'image/png',
    docType: 'DRIVERS_LICENSE'
));

try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 201) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}

channel.description:
A named set of offers, 
 Example: `channel: GOLD`

state.description:
Two-character state code in the United States. 
 Example: `state: CA`

value.description: Value of the Currency(). Two point precision decimal.

enrollments.description: The enrollments that applicant(s) have selected.

value.description: Value of the Currency(). Two point precision decimal.

additionalPaydownAmount.description:
Supply the additional pay-down amount for payment calculation. 
 **Solar and Battery only: ** If supplied, this value will overwrite the assumed ITC paydown amount.

sendEmail.description: Sends out the email with the application link

email.description: The sales representative's Goodleap associated email address

submittingUser.description: The sales representative submitting the loan application

organizationId.description: Unique identifier of an organization that a partner can add as a party to a loan.

organizationType.description: Type of the organization a partner can add as a party to a loan.

parties.description: A list of connected parties to add to the loan

decisionPageOptions.description: Decision page options for the application decision screen

post.description: Returns the url and an optional email to the application for completion and loan submission.

reason.example: We needed to cancel this loan because we like making GoodLeap sad :(

post.description:
Submit a cancellation for a given loan. 
In order to successfully cancel the loan, it must not be in the following states:
- Have a status of `DECLINED`, `CANCELLED`, or `FUNDED`
- Reached the Notice To Proceed (NTP) milestone

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/loans/{id}/cancellations');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_POST);
try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 200) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}

value.description: Value of the Currency(). Two point precision decimal.

post.description: Confirm the amount and offer of the loan.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/loans/{id}/details');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_POST);
try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 200) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}

value.description: Value of the Currency(). Two point precision decimal.

When the change order type is `AMOUNT`, then this field is a `number`
representing the new amount. When the change order type is `OFFER`, 
then this is a `string` representing the new offer ID. When the change order type is
`ENROLLMENT`, this field is an array of objects; each of those objects
has both a `type` and `value` field - the `type` is either `ADD`
or `REMOVE`, and the `value` is the type of enrollment to
add or remove.

changes.description: A specific operation to take on a loan. These must be distinct and will be rejected if they are not appropriate for the given loan.

409.description: Loan status does not allow this request

post.description:
Submit a change order to update the amount, offer, or enrollments on a loan.
Note: Once a loan has been funded, Autopay enrollment can no longer be managed via API.

x-codeSamples.label: NodeJs

x-codeSamples.source:
HttpResponse response = Unirest.post("https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/loans/{id}/changeorders")
            .header("authorization", "Basic " + Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString((YOUR_API_KEY_ID + ":" + YOUR_API_KEY_SECRET).getBytes()))
            .header("content-type", "application/json")
            .header("cache-control", "no-cache")
.body("{"field1":"xyz","field2":"abc"}")
            .asString();

name.description:
The name of the milestone the loan has reached.



`INSTALL_COMPLETE`  Indicates that the installation was completed.


`PTO_COMPLETE`  Indicates when Permission to Operate was granted.

completedAt.description:
Enter timestamp in the past to reflect when the milestone was completed. 
If not supplied, it will default to today. 
Can only be submitted once.

post.description: Transition a loan to a client-provided milestone.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/loans/{loan-id}/milestones');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_POST);
$request->setConfig(array(
  'follow_redirects' => TRUE
));
$request->setHeader(array(
  'Authorization' => '{username & api-key}',
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json'
));
$request->setBody('{\n    "name": "INSTALL_COMPLETE",\n    "completedAt": "2020-09-03T19:42:03.050Z"\n}');
try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 200) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}

sendBy.description: The unique identifier of the user.

forceRegenerateCpc.description: Tells the cpc-micro-service whether or not to regenerate the document even if it already exists.

signingStrategy.description: The signing strategy used: remote | embedded

post.description:
A successful request will result in loan documents being sent to the borrower(s). 
This can happen as one of two scenarios:
1. If loan documents have yet to be signed, unsigned documents are sent.
2. If loan documents have already been signed, a copy of the signed documents are re-sent. 
   The loans status will remain untouched.

action.description: Action found on the cases step

jsonData.description: Stringified JSON body to supply on a steps data packet

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
require_once 'HTTP/Request2.php';
$request = new HTTP_Request2();
$request->setUrl('https://api.goodleap.com/rest/v2/loans/{loanId}/cases');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_Request2::METHOD_PUT);
$request->setConfig(array(
  'follow_redirects' => TRUE
));
$request->setHeader(array(
  'Authorization' => '{ username & api-key }',
  'Content-Type' => 'application/json'
));
$request->setBody('{\n    "components": [{\n        "type": "BATTERY",\n        "manufacturer": "SomeManufacturer",\n        "quantity": 1,\n        "capacity": 12.03\n    }]\n}');
try {
  $response = $request->send();
  if ($response->getStatus() == 200) {
    echo $response->getBody();
  }
  else {
    echo 'Unexpected HTTP status: ' . $response->getStatus() . ' ' .
    $response->getReasonPhrase();
  }
}
catch(HTTP_Request2_Exception $e) {
  echo 'Error: ' . $e->getMessage();
}
